com.google.api.client.googleapis.extensions.android.accounts

Class GoogleAccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.client.googleapis.extensions.android.accounts.GoogleAccountManager

  • @Beta
public final class GoogleAccountManager
extends Object
    Beta
    Account manager wrapper for Google accounts.
    Since:
    1.11
    Author:
    Yaniv Inbar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ACCOUNT_TYPE
      Google account type.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GoogleAccountManager(android.accounts.AccountManager accountManager) 
      GoogleAccountManager(android.content.Context context) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.accounts.Account getAccountByName(String accountName)
      Returns the Google account of the given Account.name.
      android.accounts.AccountManager getAccountManager()
      Returns the account manager.
      android.accounts.Account[] getAccounts()
      Returns all Google accounts.
      void invalidateAuthToken(String authToken)
      Invalidates the given Google auth token by removing it from the account manager's cache (if necessary) for example if the auth token has expired or otherwise become invalid.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getAccountManager

        public android.accounts.AccountManager getAccountManager()
        Returns the account manager.
        Since:
        1.8

      • getAccounts

        public android.accounts.Account[] getAccounts()
        Returns all Google accounts.
        Returns:
        array of Google accounts

      • getAccountByName

        public android.accounts.Account getAccountByName(String accountName)
        Returns the Google account of the given Account.name.
        Parameters:
        accountName - Google account name or null for null result
        Returns:
        Google account or null for none found or for null input

      • invalidateAuthToken

        public void invalidateAuthToken(String authToken)
        Invalidates the given Google auth token by removing it from the account manager's cache (if necessary) for example if the auth token has expired or otherwise become invalid.
        Parameters:
        authToken - auth token
